data.actual_result: You can't expand the panel neither by reopening keyboard nor swiping up
data.expected_result: Regardless of whether there are search results or not, opening the keyboard must expand the panel in fullscreen
data.short_description: If the search in audit log gives less than 2-3 results, it's impossible to expand the panel back in full screen once you close the keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Audit Logs - Tap Filter by actions or user - Tap the textfield. Notice how the panel extends to fullscreen when keyboard opens - Type nonsense stuff in the search bar so it gives no results (or write something that gives only 2 or 3 results, works as well) - Close the keyboard - Attempt to make the panel fullscreen again (swipe up, reopen keyboard, etc)
